rooms.description: The entrance hall acts as a transitional space with ample natural light provided by floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade, adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring an inviting entry.
An open-plan living room featuring Scandinavian minimalism with clean lines and modern fixtures. Floor-to-ceiling windows on one side allow ample light and a connection to the outdoors.
Adjacent to the kitchen, it includes a dining table that can accommodate joint family gatherings. Designed with natural lighting in mind.
A modern Scandinavian kitchen featuring sleek cabinetry and high-end appliances. The design integrates energy-efficient systems and uses durable materials.
The master bedroom features a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows to promote natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
A guest bedroom designed for extended family stays. Includes access to the living area and common spaces.
The master bathroom is a private space with modern fixtures, incorporating Scandinavian design elements for functionality and simplicity.
A functional guest bathroom designed to accommodate multiple users in a joint family setting.

openings.details: Provides ample natural light and an expansive view. Reinforced design per local building codes.
Large, energy-efficient door aligned with Vastu principles ensuring proper entry of positive energies.
Seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces, enhancing the Scandinavian aesthetic while adhering to local norms.
